title: Frozen Elsa Piggy Bank for Girls – Kids Ceramic Piggy Bank with Rubber Stopper
features: DISNEY PRINCESS ELSA BANK – The perfect size for keeping kids’ savings safe, this girls’ piggy bank holds both coins and folded bills. Best of all, it’s in the shape of one of her favorite Disney princesses!

LARGE GIRLS’ PIGGY BANK - It’s 8 inches tall and 4.5 inches wide, so it won’t fill up too fast. She can put it on her nightstand or desk as a daily reminder to save her tooth fairy money and allowance.

CERAMIC WITH RUBBER STOPPER – She can easily take money out by removing the stopper at the bottom of the bank. It is made of durable, sturdy ceramic with a glossy finish. It is breakable, and is not a toy.

MAKES A GREAT FROZEN GIFT – Doubling as room décor, this ceramic bank is as functional as it is cute! Give it to girls who love the Frozen and Frozen 2 movies at birthday parties and on holidays, and expect huge smiles when they open it!
AUTHENTIC PRODUCT OF HIGH QUALITY- Product is firmly packed inside a carton, inside a custom molded Styrofoam shell to ensure it arrives in perfect condition!
LIFETIME REPLACEMENT OF RUBBER STOPPERS - Please contact our customer service to replace lost rubber stopper
description: This Disney Frozen Princess Elsa piggy bank is in the shape of Queen Elsa! It holds both coins and folded bills, and it’s easy to take money out with the bottom stopper. Doubling as room décor, this ceramic bank is as functional as it is cute! She can put it on her nightstand or desk as a constant reminder to save her change. It makes a perfect gift for Frozen fans for birthday parties and holidays!
